mudServer.Mobiles
Class MobileStd

java.lang.Object
  mudServer.Mobiles.MobileStd
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster, Player
public abstract class MobileStd
extends java.lang.Object

MobileStd sets data members common to all Mobiles. It also implements methods that are the same no matter what kind of mobile uses it.

Author:
Nemesis
